artist: Designer: William Gray Purcell; Designer: George Grant Elmslie; Manufacturer: possibly made by George Niedecken and Company
creditline: Gift of Leeds Art Foundation in honor of Jennifer Komar Olivarez
description: box shaped chair make of oak with medium brown stain; inset rectangles on sides and back with trim work design of intersecting lines; tall straight square back cushion and square seat cushion upholstered in dark greenish-brown corduroy fabric; four square oak feet
markings: red pigment inside back of chair: HMA 1987.183
title: Armchair
